data.oai_dc:dc: Input file for analysis of population history from mtDNA control region (987 aligned nucleotides) in the program IM. The input contains 188 individuals of Anas crecca (86 from North America, population 0, 58 from Eurasia, population 1, 44 from the Aleutian Islands, excluding Shemya, population 2). The command line for running IM was: -i Teal.3pop.mtDNA.IMa2.infile -q 150 -m 0.4 -t 20 -b 500000 -l 12.0 -hfg -hk 20 -hn 20 -ha 0.9 -hb 0.85 -s 976267 -p5 -o outfile.txt
